items.sentence: Compared to last summer, we haven't had so much rain this year.
Please don't forget to turn off the light before you go to bed.
Making friends with people from other countries is interesting.
Since the bus was late, we had to wait in the rain a long time.
Don't argue when you are angry and don't eat when you are full.
We weren't able to buy tickets, so we didn't go to the concert.
My little brother says that he had a dreadful dream last night.
All the furniture in the abandoned house was covered with dust.
Tom and Mary travelled together around the world on a sailboat.
Didn't you know that Tom was going to go to Australia tomorrow?
